text: Jamal Khwaja (12 August 1926 â€“ 25 December 2020) was an Indian philosopher and politician. He was born in New Delhi. Khwaja was a member of the Indian National Congress. Khwaja was a member of the Lok Sabha from 1957 to 1962. Khwaja died on 25 December 2020 in New Delhi at the age of 94. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from New Delhi Category:Indian philosophers Category:Members of the Lok Sabha
title: Jamal Khwaja
